类 GuiController

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.GuiController
所有已实现的接口:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class GuiController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
GUI controller class responsible for handling user interface interactions and game view updates. Implements Initializable interface for FXML initialization.
